title: Thanks for making it open source.
comment: The fact that you have made it open source makes the app much more useful.

title: Just too complicated
comment: Asked to download another program from the website, there's no indication as to which package to download or even why necessary. The 'standalone' all platforms version didn't work, got bored and removed. Sorry
Putting 1 star won't explain you more. Sorry.

title: Not possible to configure the font size
comment: Because it's not possible to configure the font size the reader is hardly usable on a tablet. But I like its clean and straight forward design.
The application is now fully optimized for tablets, and the font size is configurable among other new things.

title: Fantastic
comment: Simple and beautiful app. Great project, thanks devs!
